show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
The show is uploaded to Dropbox. <!--more--> Here is the outline for the Prescriptions for Health Show for tomorrow am: Do vegetarians really have a lower risk of heart disease?
Does vitamin C cause or prevent kidney stones?
Does everybody need a calcium supplement?
What is the difference between systolic and diastolic hypertension/ Is melatonin effective as a cancer treatment?
Vicki’s 20-20 tips include: The truth about organic food A diet for stress
